response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: Iterator<String> itererator = windowId.iterator();
                    while (itererator.hasNext()) {
                        String nextWindowId = itererator.next();
                        Driver.switchTo().window(nextWindowId);
                        System.out.println(Driver.getTitle());
                        Thread.sleep(3000);
                        Driver.close();
                    }
<<<explanation>>>: You can use an iterator to iterate through the list of window handles and switch to each window in turn. The `Driver.switchTo().window(nextWindowId)` method can be used to switch to the next window in the list. The `Driver.getTitle()` method can be used to get the title of the current window, and the `Driver.close()` method can be used to close the current window.
